name: UpSlide
description:
UpSlide is the World's leading add-in suite for Microsoft Office. Our mission is to help professionals work better. Our software dramatically improves the functionality of Office. It’s used by firms like KPMG, Deloitte, and BNP Paribas to make stylish slides in record time. 

We have offices in Paris, London and New York.

Visit us at www.upslide.net

jobs.title: Consultant - Client Solutions
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a wicked smart, tech-savvy, project-managing, people person to join our London office as a Product Expert.

UpSlide is a rapidly growing tech startup whose goal is to help PowerPoint and Excel users make stylish slides in record time. Our software dramatically improves the functionality of Office and is used by firms like KPMG, Deloitte, and BNP Paribas to achieve outstanding results.

As a Product Expert, you’ll help clients solve pressing problems by: managing projects, customising UpSlide, creating solutions, training users and ensuring the successful launch and use of UpSlide in their teams.

Key activities
- Project management – own project delivery, building a relationship with the client, and coordinating to get projects delivered in a timeline manner
- Setup – customise UpSlide to meet client needs, ensuring high quality deliverables
- Consulting – advise clients as an expert in UpSlide, analyse their presentation production practices and suggest and implement new ideas to optimize them
- Training – train new users and administrators to ensure successful adoption

Skills and attributes
You must have:
- An interest in helping clients solve problems with technology and a taste for Microsoft Office
- Excellent project management and organisation skills
- Technical aptitude, quick learning and strong problem solving abilities 
- An eye for detail and high standards for deliverables
- Excellent people, communication and presenting skills
- Excellent written and spoken English

Qualifications and experience
You must have:
- A degree from a top university – likely in a technical or scientific discipline
- 1-3 years' experience – including project management and client-facing experience
- Experience with Excel, Word and PowerPoint
- UK work eligibility

We’d love it if you have:
- Familiarity with financial and professional services
- Experience with VBA macros
- A second language

Salary: Competitive
Type: Full time, permanent
Start date: ASAP

Application instructions
To apply please submit your CV and a short cover letter letting us know: why you’re interested in the role, why you think you’d be a good fit, and your favourite keyboard shortcut!

jobs.title: Stage - Growth Associate (Business Dev)
jobs.description:
UpSlide propose de rejoindre son équipe de Business Development à des étudiants en césure ou fin de cursus qui sont smart, énergiques et déterminés. C’est l’opportunité de prendre part à une aventure humaine valorisante, riche d’expériences avec des clients passionnants (grands comptes du monde de la finance). C’est aussi un moyen de rejoindre une startup déjà solide et en pleine croissance.

Responsabilités et opportunités du poste
Tu aimes les défis et les relations humaines, tu veux progresser rapidement dans les fonctions de Business Development ?
Nous te proposons un stage sur mesure pour découvrir le métier de Sales de A à Z dans une startup BtoB : participation à l'élaboration de la stratégie, gestion d’une base de données clients (CRM), méthode de « scraping », organisation d’évènements, mailing et phoning intelligents, amélioration des processus etc. 
Tu apprendras également à convaincre et traiter avec des grands comptes reconnus (Société Générale, KPMG, AXA…). Tu participeras aussi à l’amélioration des méthodes et processus en gérant des "side projects".
Bref, tout pour apprendre et travailler de la manière la plus agréable et intelligente !

Ce n'est pas tout !
Tu as des mentors en interne qui t’aident à progresser et t’apportent de l’aide dès que tu en as besoin.
Tu travailles en lien direct avec les fondateurs et les autres équipes : Marketing, Communication, Design, Équipe d'implémentation etc.
Tu as un véritable impact sur le développement de l’entreprise et de l’équipe.

Les "plus" du poste
Un stage riche en apprentissage et responsabilité,
Équipe dynamique et bienveillante,
De superbes bureaux en plein cœur de Paris, avenue de l’Opéra,
Stage pouvant se transformer en CDI.

jobs.title: UpSlide UK - Account Manager UK / EMEA
jobs.description:
We are looking for an outstanding person to join the Sales team and pioneer the Account Management role in the UK. If you enjoy client nurturing, relationship building and revenue generation, this role is for you! 
UpSlide is a rapidly growing tech scale-up whose mission is to help Microsoft Office users work better. UpSlide adds smart features to PowerPoint, Excel, and Word to make stylish slides in record time. 450+ teams in 60 countries have already adopted UpSlide – KPMG, Rothschild & Co, Citi, and many others. 
We are 80 passionate people across 5 offices: Paris, London, New York, Berlin and Singapore. We cultivate three values: Excellence, Trust, and Happiness at work - We are proud to be #1 HappyIndex®/AtWork in 2019!

Your missions
•	Build solid and lasting relationships with your Clients
•	Be the face of UpSlide, create value for our clients and build awareness 
•	Secure contract renewals
•	Maximize revenue of your Accounts, by up-selling, cross-selling 
•	Work hands in hands with Sales and Consultants to ensure client satisfaction and revenue growth:
o	Work hand in hand with Sales to grow revenue 
o	Work hand in hand with Consultants to propose relevant actions and solutions to maximize usage rate and client satisfaction

You will have the opportunity to shape this role, implement best practices and potentially build the rest of the team going forward. 

About you
•	You have a minimum of 2:1 or equivalent from a top-tier university or business school
•	Min 2 years of closing or Account Management experience – preferably in SAAS - with a proven track record of generating new business and achieving revenue growth
•	Excellent interpersonal skills, you are outgoing and good at connecting people  
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills, proposal preparation and presentation skills
•	Passionate, driven, and curious
•	Strong interest in technology
•	Proactive and resourceful 
•	Eligible to work in the UK

Bonus points if you have:
•	Familiarity with financial and professional services
•	A second language
•	Experience using Salesforce.com
Salary and benefits
•	Competitive package
•	Career progression
•	Amazing Central London offices
•	Regular social activities

Type: Full time, permanent
Start date: ASAP

Joining UpSlide it’s: 
•	Being part of a profitable and self-funded scale-up (€0 fundraising since its creation in 2009!)
•	Participate in an exciting international expansion 
•	Growing professionally by working autonomously on your own projects 
•	Benefit from personalized career and training plans to strengthen your skills 
•	Have a positive impact: we are working towards the b-corp certification

Application Instructions: To apply please submit your CV and a few words about why you would be a good fit for the role and why you’d like to join us.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate - New York City
jobs.description:
We’re looking for energetic, determined and entrepreneurial recent graduates to join our growing team in NYC as Business Development Associates. This is a unique opportunity to join an international startup scaling in the U.S., learn valuable business development and growth strategy skills, and make an impact early in your career. 

UpSlide is a rapidly growing SaaS scale-up dedicated to helping modernize the way financial services professionals work. Our Microsoft Office add-in is used by firms like Citi, KPMG, and Deloitte to streamline the process of building pitches, financial reports, and other deliverables. Today we are around 80 people across five offices in Paris, London, Berlin, Singapore, and New York. 

Join us on our journey!  

Responsibilities:

This role will provide you with the knowledge and skills to become a successful business development professional and insight into the process of scaling an international SaaS startup.  

You’ll work closely with the U.S. CEO to develop growth strategies, seek out new business opportunities, and prospect potential clients across North America.  

There are opportunities for quick progression within the U.S. business development team.  

Key activities:

• Conduct market research and identify opportunities  
• Build strategic account plans  
• Define and implement outbound sales campaigns  
• Generate new business opportunities 
• Innovate and optimize our business development strategy 

This role will provide you with the knowledge and skills to become a successful business development professional and insight into the process of scaling-up a B2B tech business.

You will gain exposure to not only the Business Development team, but also Marketing and Product Development who you'll be working closely with on various projects. This role also provides a great platform for a career in entrepreneurship, marketing, partnerships and growth.

Requirements:

• A minimum 3.4 GPA or equivalent from a top-tier college or university  
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills 
• Entrepreneurial and goal-driven team player 
• Curious and fast learner  
• Eligible to work in the US 

Bonus points if you have:

• Experience or familiarity with the financial services 
• Experience in sales, business development, or growth strategy 
• Speak a second language  

What you'll get from us:

• We believe in work-life harmony, and can provide flexible working hours
• At UpSlide we value integrity, honesty and independent decision-making
• Open and dog-friendly office in the heart of NYC
• Orientation Week at our office in the heart of Paris
• Participation in the company's annual week-long seminars in Europe
• Regular office events and opportunities for personal development
• Friendly, warm atmosphere and motivated colleagues who love what they do and who they work with

Salary: Competitive package, with fixed salary + bonus
Type: Full time, permanent
Start date: ASAP

Application instructions: To apply please submit your resume and a paragraph on your three core values and what they mean to you.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate - London, UK
jobs.description:
We’re looking for outstanding individuals with at least one-year sales experience who are energetic, determined and super smart to join our Business Development team as Associates. This is a unique opportunity to join a rapidly-growing business in its scale-up phase, learn valuable business development skills, and make an impact.

UpSlide is a rapidly-growing, profitable and self-funded, tech startup whose mission is to help professionals work better. Our software dramatically improves the functionality of Office. It’s used by firms like KPMG, Deloitte, and BNP Paribas to make stylish slides in record time. Today we are around 80 people across five offices in London, New York, Paris, Berlin and Singapore. 

Responsibilities

You’ll work closely with the Head of UK and Head of Business Development to seek out new business opportunities and start meaningful conversations with potential clients in the UK and beyond.

We leverage smart strategies and channels to deliver high impact results.

During your first year at UpSlide you’ll:

*     Research companies, sectors and markets to optimise our approach
*     Work closely with the senior business development team to strategise on key accounts, industries and geographies
*     Define and implement intelligent outbound campaigns – email, phone, events and more
*     Identify and target future key clients and contacts
*     Secure initial meetings with senior executives and create new business opportunities
*     Look for opportunities to innovate and optimise lead generation

This role will provide you with the knowledge and skills to become a successful business development professional and insight into the process of scaling-up a B2B tech business.

There are opportunities for progression within the business development team. This role also provides a great platform for a career in entrepreneurship, marketing, partnerships and growth.

Requirements

*     At least one year's sales or related experience
*     Minimum 2:1 or equivalent from a top-tier university or business school
*     Entrepreneurial, determined and goal-driven team player
*     Intelligent, analytical and curious
*     Excellent written and verbal communication skills
*     Eligible to work in the UK

Bonus points if you have:

*     2+ year's experience in sales, business development, partnerships, or marketing
*     Familiarity with financial and professional services
*     A second language

Salary: Competitive package
Type: Full time, permanent
Start date: ASAP
